text.*:
Buricodava
Alternate name Itadeva, Itadeba
Location Burgaraca,​ Republic of Macedonia

Itadava (Itadeva, Itadeba, Ancient Greek: Ἰταδεβά) was a Dacian town, in the territory of the fortress with unknown name near Burgaraca.[1]

Contents

  • 1 See also
  • 2 Notes
  • 3 References
    • 3.1 Ancient
    • 3.2 Modern
  • 4 Further reading
